review: We have enjoyed it. It was given to us as a Christmas gift.
author: BK

review: We've only had it a week but it's pretty amazing so far.
author: Alice

review: Easy to install,  easy to use. Great picture quality and had a screen saver which we really appreciated.
author: Britt

review: Love it!  So much to choose from when you have Amazon Prime. Even better we bought it around the holidays when it was on sale. Great for the price!
author: Catherine Hankinson

review: Needs newer Prime movies. Also a bit difficult to pair a non-Fire TV Game Controller.
author: B Crandall

review: This was a present for my Husband, and he absolutely loved it.  He said the picture quality was incredible.  He said it does so much more than the other brand we have in the living room.
author: SARAH MARTIN
